titleStmt.title: The old gentlewomans last legacy [t]o her sons and daughters upon her death-bed, a little before she departed out of this world. With her good instructions, that she gave them to live a godly sober life, for the good of their own souls, till God call them out of this world. Tune of My bleeding heart. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye Corner,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.
